REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3085 reute r f BC-GOTAAS-LARSEN-<GOTLF> 03-16 0045

TEXT.TITLE: GOTAAS-LARSEN <GOTLF> TO BUILD FIFTH CARRIER
TEXT.BODY: Gotaas-Larsen Shipping Corp said it had exercised an option to build a fifth in a series of crude oil carriers to be constructed by <Daewoo Shipbuilding and Heavy Machinery Ltd> in South Korea. Reuter
